name: Tender.fi
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: $TND is the utility token for the Tender.fi protocol, an innovative decentralized open-source protocol for borrowing and lending and a novel mechanism for collateralizing long-tail assets. The Tender.fi protocol is owned and governed by $TND token holders. Protocol rewards and incentives will be paid in $TND. As the protocol develops, $TND will impart additional benefits to holders such as improved LTVs, lower borrowing costs and higher deposit rates.
